name: Dynamic Warmups
description: Preparing the body for movement by increasing blood flow and joint mobility.

cards.title: Leg Swings for Hip Mobility
cards.description: Increasing hip range of motion through controlled leg swings.
bulletpoints: Engage the core to maintain balance
Start with small swings and gradually increase range

cards.title: Arm Circles for Shoulder Mobility
cards.description: Warming up the shoulders with circular movements.
bulletpoints: Perform small, medium, and large circles in both directions
Keep arms extended to maximize stretch
Increase speed gradually to activate muscles
